name: MEC Linux OS Distribution
short_description: This is our own customized Linux OS distribution based on Ubuntu 12.04 LTS. There are i386 and amd64 desktop versions. You can download them and distribute them as you like, but we do not permit you to modify any part of presented data for re-distribution without removing our trade marks, logos and visualization.
